sentences: Gyan Riley (born 1977) is an American guitarist and composer.
They frequently collaborate, including a tour in Europe in September 2016.
He released his solo album Stream of Gratitude in 2013 on John Zorn's Tzadik Records.
He has also performed with Zakir Hussain, Dawn Upshaw, and the San Francisco Symphony, among others.
In 2015, he released Nayive Eviyan, a collaboration with Czech violinist Iva Bittov√°.
